title: Investigate ReconnectApp blocking the user internactions

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
Coming from this [thread](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C05LX9D6E07/p1760523807465939), investigate the app being blocked/ stuck from user interaction when opened after a long time of inactivity (so the onyx updates are being processed).

Lets try to remove this delay so user can always immediately interact with the app

<details><summary>Issue Owner</summary>Current Issue Owner: @truph01</details>

title: [$250] LHN - Archived #Admins room remains on LHN with GBR if it has pending request to join workspace

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.31-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-1291/folder/13176686/41236627/952580720 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** ibellicotest+1926@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Motorola MotoG60 / Android 12 / Chrome ( mWeb / Hybrid app) - Windows 11 / Chrome **App Component:** Left Hand Navigation (LHN) ## Action Performed: Prerequisite: User A, has at least one workspace. Prerequisite 2: Have two accounts opened on two different devices or environments. 1. Open the Expensify app. 2. Navigate to "Workspaces" and open any workspace. 3. Tap on "Overview" 4. Tap on "More" and select "Share" 5. Copy the URL of the workspace. 6. Start a new chat with User B. 7. Paste the just copied URL. 8. As User B, navigate to the just received URL. 9. As User A, navigate to #Admins room. 10. Note that a request from User B, to join the workspace, was received. 11. Without accepting or declining the request, navigate to "Workspaces" and delete the workspace. 12. Return to LHN. 13. Note that #Admins room is still displayed on LHN with an "Archived" label and GBR. ## Expected Result: #Admins room should disappear from LHN after the workspace is deleted. ## Actual Result: Archived #Admins room, remains on LHN with GBR if it contains a pending request to join the workspace. Request is no longer visible on chat, but room still remains on LHN and user can´t make it disappear. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/538fa1c5-b735-4841-aca9-d90ee2ffaedd [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

  • Upwork Job ID: 1978472851052585709
  • Last Price Increase: 2025-10-15

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.31-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** Exp **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** sdijsnoisjnosij@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Samsung Galaxy S25 FE / Android 16 **App Component:** Other ## Action Performed: 1. Launch Expensify app. 2. Background the app. 3. Go to device settings and change device font size (any size). 4. Foreground the app. → App is stuck at splash screen. 5. Kill the app. 6. Relaunch the app. → App crashes. ## Expected Result: After changing device font size and foregrounding the app, app will not stuck at splash screen. ## Actual Result: After changing device font size and foregrounding the app, app is stuck at splash screen. When relaunching the app, app crashes. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos [Bug6975194_1760500899342!log.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/22919384/Bug6975194_1760500899342.log.txt) https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d81cf223-a909-4b6e-8ef0-6092183b19df [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.30-5 **Reproducible in staging?:** Y **Reproducible in production?:** Y **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** N/A **Issue reported by:** Applause - Internal Team ## Action Performed: 1. Go to https://staging.new.expensify.com/home 2. Open a paid expense 3. Tap header 4. In details page, select from "link " and tap on it 5. Note in expense preview page , drag handler is shown 6. Open the expense 7. Note drag handler is still displayed ## Expected Result: Drag handler must not be shown in preview and expense details page. ## Actual Result: Drag handler is shown in preview and expense details page ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Select the officially supported platforms where the issue was reproduced: - [ ] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** v9.2.31-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** https://github.com/Expensify/Expensify/issues/444815 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** N/A **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team ## Action Performed: Precondition - Enable debug mode 1. Open a report that doesn't exist from the url (e.g. r/123456) ## Expected Result: The view above the bottom navigation bar displays a message saying 'There's a report with errors,' and clicking the View button opens the RHP with the debug report page containing the data of the offending report. ## Actual Result: No error message is shown; instead, it keeps displaying 'There's a report awaiting action.' Clicking on the View > View Report button in the debug page redirects to the Concierge chat page. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d91e5d0b-85db-4fce-a7ea-fbe1dce8bc93
